PERSONA:
john thompson is a 57-year-old white, non-hispanic male living in des moines, iowa. john is married to his wife, karen, whom he met in high school. they have two adult children, michael and emily, who both live in nearby towns. john and karen reside in a two-story, single-family home in a suburban neighborhood on the outskirts of des moines, which they purchased 20 years ago for $150,000 and have since renovated. their property appreciates at an annual rate of 3%, bringing the current value to approximately $275,000. john and karen rent a small investment property downtown, a one-bedroom apartment for $700 rent.

a high school graduate with a certificate in automotive repair, john currently works as a fleet manager for a regional logistics company, yusen logistics (america), where he has been employed for over 15 years, from january 1989 - october 2013, but departed, started in january of 2014. he earns an annual salary of approximately $68,000, depending on bonuses and profit margins. his wife works as a dental hygienist for an orthodontic clinic in west des moines, with an annual salary of around $55,000. john contributes to his company's retirement plan.
